mapper.select: select a.CD ,a.NM ,a.SEQ ,a.COMMENTS ,a.DEL_YN ,a.REG_DATE ,a.REG_USER ,a.MOD_DATE ,a.MOD_USER from TRT0204 a where a.AID = #{aid} and a.APP_TYPE = #{appType} and a.DEL_YN = 'N'
select count(*) as cnt from TRT0204 where APP_TYPE = #{appType} and AID = #{aid} and CD = #{cd}

SELECT a.SYSTEM_ID as "systemId" ,b.SYSTEM_NM as "systemName" ,b.SYSTEM_CD as "systemCd" ,a.SEQ as "systemSeq" ,a.NODE_TYPE as "systemType" ,cd01.NM as "systemTypeName" FROM TAN0213 a INNER JOIN TIM0101 b ON INTERFACE_ID = #{interfaceId} AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.SYSTEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TSU0301 CD01 ON a.NODE_TYPE = cd01.CD AND cd01.LEVEL1 = 'IM' AND cd01.LEVEL2 = '08' ORDER BY a.SEQ
mapper.delete: delete from TRT0202 where INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from TRT0201 where INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from TRT0401 where INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
delete from TRT0501 where INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.INTERFACE_MID AS A_MID ,a.NAME AS A_NAME ,a.INTERFACE_ID AS A_INTERFACE_ID ,ab.INTEGRATION_ID AS A_INTEGRATION_ID ,a.STAGE AS A_STAGE ,a.STD AS A_STD ,im10.NM AS A_STAGE_NM ,a.DEPLOY_STATUS AS A_DEPLOY_STATUS ,an12.NM AS A_DEPLOY_STATUS_NM ,a.LAST_DEPLOY_DATE AS A_LAST_DEPLOY_DATE ,a.LAST_DEPLOY_USER AS A_LAST_DEPLOY_USER ,depuser.USER_NM AS A_LAST_DEPLOY_USER_NM ,(select count(DATASET_ID) from TRT0401 where INTERFACE_MID = a.INTERFACE_MID and DEL_YN = 'N') AS A_LAYOUT_CNT ,(select count(MAP_ID) from TRT0501 where INTERFACE_MID = a.INTERFACE_MID and DEL_YN = 'N') AS A_MAPPING_CNT ,a.COMMENTS AS A_COMMENTS ,a.DEL_YN AS A_DEL_YN ,a.REG_DATE AS A_REG_DATE ,a.REG_USER AS A_REG_USER ,reguser.USER_NM AS A_REG_USER_N ,a.MOD_DATE AS A_MOD_DATE ,a.MOD_USER AS A_MOD_USER ,MODUSER.USER_NM AS A_MOD_USER_NM
,(select COALESCE(max(VERSION::numeric), 0) from TRT0102 where INTERFACE_MID = a.INTERFACE_MID) AS A_VERSION
,(select COALESCE(max(to_number(VERSION)), 0) from TRT0102 where INTERFACE_MID = a.INTERFACE_MID) AS A_VERSION
,b.APP_MID AS B_MID ,b.NAME AS B_NAME ,b.CD AS B_CD ,b.APP_TYPE AS B_APP_TYPE ,rt01.NM AS B_APP_TYPE_NM ,b.SYSTEM_ID AS B_SYSTEM_ID ,ba.SYSTEM_NM AS B_SYSTEM_NM ,ba.SYSTEM_CD AS B_SYSTEM_CD ,b.SEQ AS B_SEQ ,b.SYSTEM_TYPE AS B_SYSTEM_TYPE ,im08.NM AS B_SYSTEM_TYPE_NM ,b.SERVER_ID AS B_SERVER_ID ,bb.SERVER_NM AS B_SERVER_NM ,bb.SERVER_CD AS B_SERVER_CD ,b.COMMENTS AS B_COMMENTS ,b.DEL_YN AS B_DEL_YN ,b.REG_DATE AS B_REG_DATE ,b.REG_USER AS B_REG_USER ,b.MOD_DATE AS B_MOD_DATE ,b.MOD_USER AS B_MOD_USER ,e.INTERFACE_MID AS E_INTERFACE_MID ,e.APP_MID AS E_APP_MID ,e.MSG_MID AS E_MID ,e.DATASET_ID AS E_DATASET_ID ,e.NAME AS E_NAME ,e."TYPE" AS E_TYPE ,f.INTERFACE_MID AS F_INTERFACE_MID ,f.APP_MID AS F_APP_MID ,f.MAP_MID AS F_MID ,f.MAP_ID AS F_MAP_ID ,f.NAME AS F_NAME ,f."TYPE" AS F_TYPE FROM TRT0101 a INNER JOIN TRT0201 b ON a.INTERFACE_MID = b.INTERFACE_MID AND a.DEL_YN = 'N' AND b.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND a.INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.INTERFACE_ID = #{interfaceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.INTERFACE_MID IN (SELECT DISTINCT INTERFACE_MID FROM TRT0401 WHERE DATASET_ID = #{dataSetId})
AND a.INTERFACE_MID IN (SELECT DISTINCT INTERFACE_MID FROM TRT0501 WHERE MAP_ID = #{dataMapId})
INNER JOIN TAN0201 ab ON ab.INTERFACE_ID = a.INTERFACE_ID
AND ab.INTEGRATION_ID = #{integrationId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
INNER JOIN TIM0101 ba ON b.SYSTEM_ID = ba.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN TIM0201 bb ON b.SERVER_ID = bb.SERVER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TRT0401 e ON e.INTERFACE_MID = b.INTERFACE_MID AND e.APP_MID = b.APP_MID AND e.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TRT0501 f ON f.INTERFACE_MID = b.INTERFACE_MID AND f.APP_MID = b.APP_MID AND f.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TSU0301 im10 ON im10.CD = a.STAGE AND im10.LEVEL1 = 'IM' AND im10.LEVEL2 = '10' AND im10.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TSU0301 an12 ON an12.CD = a.DEPLOY_STATUS AND an12.LEVEL1 = 'AN' AND an12.LEVEL2 = '12' AND an12.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TSU0301 rt01 ON rt01.CD = b.APP_TYPE AND rt01.LEVEL1 = 'RT' AND rt01.LEVEL2 = '01' AND rt01.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TSU0301 im08 ON im08.CD = b.SYSTEM_TYPE AND im08.LEVEL1 = 'IM' AND im08.LEVEL2 = '08' AND im08.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TSU0101 depuser ON depuser.USER_ID = a.LAST_DEPLOY_USER LEFT OUTER JOIN TSU0101 reguser ON reguser.USER_ID = a.REG_USER LEFT OUTER JOIN TSU0101 moduser ON moduser.USER_ID = a.MOD_USER ORDER BY a.INTERFACE_MID, b.APP_MID, b.SEQ

SELECT a.INTERFACE_MID ,a.APP_MID ,a.APP_TYPE ,b.AID ,b.NAME ,b.CD ,b."TYPE" ,a.SEQ ,a.VAL ,a.TAG ,b.INPUT_TYPE ,b.DEFAULT_VALUE FROM TRT0202 a INNER JOIN TRT0203 b ON a.APP_TYPE = b.APP_TYPE AND a.AID = b.AID AND a.INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.APP_MID = #{appMid , jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.INTERFACE_MID ,a.APP_MID ,a.MSG_MID ,a.NAME ,a.DATASET_ID ,b.CD ,a."TYPE" ,a.COMMENTS ,a.DEL_YN ,a.REG_DATE ,a.REG_USER ,a.MOD_DATE ,a.MOD_USER FROM TRT0401 a INNER JOIN TAN0501 b ON a.DATASET_ID = b.DATASET_ID AND a.INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.APP_MID = #{appMid , jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.INTERFACE_MID ,a.APP_MID ,a.MAP_MID ,a.NAME ,a.MAP_ID ,b.CD ,a."TYPE" ,a.COMMENTS ,a.DEL_YN ,a.REG_DATE ,a.REG_USER ,a.MOD_DATE ,a.MOD_USER FROM TRT0501 a INNER JOIN TAN0503 b ON a.MAP_ID = b.MAP_ID AND a.INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.APP_MID = #{appMid , jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.INTERFACE_MID ,a.VERSION ,a.CONTENTS ,a.REG_DATE ,a.REG_USER ,b.USER_NM from TRT0102 a inner join TSU0101 b on b.USER_ID = a.REG_USER and a.INTERFACE_MID = #{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.VERSION desc

SELECT a.APP_TYPE ,a.APP_TYPE_NM ,a.RSS_CD ,a.CHANNEL_ID ,a.NODE_TYPE ,b.NM AS RSS_NM FROM TRT0207 a INNER JOIN TSU0301 b ON a.RSS_CD = b.CD AND a.APP_TYPE = #{appType} AND a.DEL_YN = 'N' AND b.LEVEL1 = 'IM' AND b.LEVEL2 = '04'
SELECT a.APP_TYPE FROM TRT0207 a WHERE UPPER(a.APP_TYPE) = UPPER(#{appType})
SELECT INTERFACE_ID FROM TRT0101 WHERE INTERFACE_MID = #{interfaceMid} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
